籤詩版本二:
Pedestrians say it is hard to breathe
Do not approach if there is a sudden disaster
The nest is broken and the forest bird has nowhere to stay
Find a safe place in the depths
詩意: This hexagram represents the bird and magpie leaving the forest. Everything should be done according to one's heart.
解曰: If people get resentment. When to stretch. Believe it or not. Stay conservative and wait.
籤詩故事一:
◇Su Qin Dezhi
Warring States Period. Su Qin is from Luoyang. Worship Gui Guzi as his teacher.
He lobbied the King of Qin and wrote twelve times but was not accepted.
The leather jacket is torn and the money is gone. Go home haggard. After returning home, his wife ignored him and his sister-in-law refused to cook.
Su Qin was ashamed and angry. I got the Taigong Yin Talisman (title of the book) and studied hard.
When I was confused and tired, I stabbed my thigh with an iron awl. It hurt and I read again.
Later, he used the theory of unity to unite the six countries to fight against Qin. Lobby the King of Zhao to become the Prime Minister of the Six Kingdoms.
聖意:
Home and house: bad things happen first and then good things happen.
Beware of yourself.
Seek wealth and good luck.
Transaction completed.
Marriage is blocked.
Rokko Male.
Pedestrians go smoothly.
Tiancan: Profit.


The six animals are prosperous.
Looking for someone to meet.
The lawsuit is justified.
Migration is difficult (far away).
Lost items are hard to find.
Disease makes a wish.
Mountain tomb is auspicious.
